LanguageData.Destroyer_Giant.label: giant
LanguageData.Destroyer_Giant.description: A large semi-humanoid creature that can take a lot of damage. It is slower than a standard human but has much more health.
LanguageData.Destroyer_Giant.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.Destroyer_Giant.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
